description: Details of precautions to secure and protect the interior elements against accidental loss or damage during building work pursuant to condition 3 of Listed Building Consent ref. PP/2011/5255 dated 27/04/12 for Internal and external alterations to Acton Town Hall and alterations to Acton Baths' chimney in association with the redevelopment of Acton Swimming Baths, Kings Rooms and Acton Town Hall to provide a building comprising a new swimming pool and learner pool with associated changing facilities, studio spaces, fitness suite, community facilities and a reception hall located behind the retained Kings Rooms facade and attached to the Town Hall Extension; change of use of the Town Hall Extension to a service centre on the ground floor and library on the first floor and associated cycle storage and waste and recycling facilities (Listed Building Consent).
